@nypost.com> 7/29/2019 6:23 PM >>>
Hi,

Can you provide an update on inmate Jeffrey Edward Epstein, Register Number: 76318-054, who is being held without bail at New York MCC?
Specifically, what is the status of the investigation into the injuries he sustained to his neck last week, and where is he currently housed?
Please let me know asap.
Thanks,

(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Reporter, New York Post
1211 AVENUE OF THE AMERICAS, NEW YORK, NY 10036
WORK: 212.93(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
@nypost.com
nypost.com
